item.description:
An opera about fairies and potential incest! Strephon the shepherd wants to marry Phyllis who is a ward of the Chancery. Phyllis does not know that Strephon is half fairy so when she sees Strephon kissing a seemingly young woman she assumes the worst. Her "rival" turns out to be none other than Strephon's mother, a fairy who never grows old.

Phyllis' guardian, the Lord Chancellor, and half the peers in the House of Lords pine after her. Due to a number of other random mishaps, the peers and the fairies are at war. Will Phyllis choose Strephon or a member of the House of Lords?

Performances are all in the Sala de Puerto Rico room on the 2nd floor of the Stratton Student Center at 84 Mass Ave.

There are 6 performances:

Friday, May 3 at 8 PM
Saturday, May 4 at 8 PM
Sunday, May 5 at 2 PM
Thursday, May 9 at 8 PM
Friday, May 10 at 8 PM
Saturday, May 11 at 2 PM

Tix are $5 for students, $10 for MIT community, and $15 for everyone else. You can buy tix at the door or reserve them online at gsp.mit.edu Hope you can make it!
item.name: MIT Gilbert & Sullivan Players present "Iolanthe"
